Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Some Harlem-bound Green Line trains are operating with residual delays after earlier police activity at Conservatory. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Harlem-bound Green Line trains are operating with residual delays after earlier police activity at Conservatory.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
